title: Police: Woman cited for breast-feeding while driving
text:
A woman was ticketed Wednesday night for breast-feeding while driving on a Washington interstate.
>> Read more trending stories
According to the Washington State Patrol, a person called 911 saying they saw what looked like a one-year-old boy sitting on a womanâ€™s lap.
Troopers spotted the vehicle and pulled the driver over.
I WISH I WAS KIDDING: 911 caller reports baby riding on mom's lap. When Trooper stops car, he realizes mom is breast feeding the child ðŸ˜®
â€” Trooper Mark Francis (@wspd7pio) August 27, 2015 When the trooper approached the car, he saw the woman breast-feeding the child. The driver told the trooper the child wouldnâ€™t stop screaming and that sheâ€™s done it before.
The woman was cited for child restraint violation. After being ticketed, she put her baby back in his car seat.
